product.name: Color
product.description: Defines the primary color or pattern, such as blue or striped

product.name: Fabric
product.description: Identifies the type of fabric used in a product, for example, cotton or denim

product.name: Age group
product.description: Defines the target age range for a product, such as adults or kids

product.name: Pants length type
product.description: Used to defines the length of pants, such as cropped or long

product.name: Target gender
product.description: Identifies the intended gender for a product, such as female, male or unisex

product.name: Size
product.description: Used to specify the size of a product, such as 0-3 months or Extra large (XL)

product.name: product_care
product.description: product care section shown in product page as a collapsible text

product.name: size_table_html
product.description: size table in html, shown in product pages as a collapsible text field
